# iphone-sync

An open source CLI script for Windows to backup photos from your iPhone

## Installation

You can install the package via pip:

```
pip install iphone-sync
```

## Usage

```
iphone-sync PATH_TO_OUTPUT_FOLDER
```

## Example

```
iphone-sync "D:\Backup"
```
